Namo:
Earlier, the Drakes constantly moved across long distances.
Of course, the current drakes are not the same as before, but their nomadic lifestyle, no doubt, made them stronger. At first we didn't even notice that the Undead began to appear.
The question is, what is the relationship between Spatial Rift in the Valley of Dragons and these events. To install it will not be easy, as we are very limited in resources.
